citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
One geriatric male red ruffed Lemur is housed alone in an enclosure . He does have auditory but no visual contact with a
tamarin in the next enclosure . The present plan for environmental enhancement does not give details about meeting the
needs of individually housed non human primates that are unable to see and hear nonhuman primates of their own or
compatible species. The facility states that there is a new attending veterinarian but he has not yet reviewed the plan. The
plan must address these special considerations and be in accordance with the instructions of the attending veterinarian .
CORRECT BY : 3/7/2024

The green gate at the entrance to the former petting zoo barn is leaning. There is a gap between the gate and the support
post large enough to trap an animals head . The gate must be repaired and the enclosure maintained in good repair to
prevent injury to the animals.
CORRECT BY : 2/15/24

citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
Although birds at this facility are provdied enrichment , the faiclity has not yet developed a plan for environmental
enhancemement for birds that is approved by the attending veterinarian . The plan must address social needs.
environmental enrichment . special considerations and restraint devices if needed.
CORRECT BY : 3/7/2024
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with zoo employees .

narrative:
3.81(c)(4) 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
One geriatric male red ruffed Lemur is housed alone in an enclosure . He does have auditory but no visual contact with a 
tamarin in the next enclosure . The present plan for environmental enhancement does not give details about meeting the 
needs of individually housed non human primates that are unable to see and hear nonhuman primates of their own or 
compatible species. The facility states that there is a new attending veterinarian but he has not yet reviewed the plan. The 
plan must address these special considerations and be in accordance with the instructions of the attending veterinarian .  
CORRECT BY : 3/7/2024 
3.125(a)  Repeat
   
Facilities, general. 
The green gate at the entrance to the former petting zoo barn is leaning. There is a gap between the gate and the support 
post large enough to trap an animals head . The gate must be repaired and the enclosure maintained in good repair to 
prevent injury to the animals. 
CORRECT BY : 2/15/24 
3.154 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
Although birds at this facility are provdied enrichment , the faiclity has not yet developed a plan for environmental 
enhancemement for birds that is approved by the attending veterinarian . The plan must address social needs. 
environmental enrichment . special considerations and restraint devices if needed.  
CORRECT BY : 3/7/2024 
 
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with zoo employees .
